summary: The Basic plain unimproved Thieves Guild armor is just plain leather and should be able to be enchanted but for some reason was not. Due to this is because obsolete very fast and the only useful piece is whichever one you chose to \"improve\". This mod simply makes the basic pieces enchantable.
descriptionHtml:
The Basic plain unimproved Thieves Guild armor is just plain leather and should be able to be enchanted but for some reason was not. Due to this is because obsolete very fast and the only useful piece is whichever one you chose to \"improve\". This mod simply makes the basic pieces enchantable.

As an added bonus this mod will also set all Thieves guild pieces as \"VendorNoSale\" which means you cannot sell them. This is done so you do not accidentally sell your thieves guild armor because if you do get rid of it you will not be able to fully finish the thieves guild quest storyline.

Installation: Simply unrar the esp file into your Skyrim/Data directory and make sure it is checked off in the \"Data\" section of the Skyrim launcher.
author: BeastGevaudan

files.name: Enchantable No Sale Thieves Guild Armor
